definitions.definition: A type of small boat, covered over by a surface deck, powered by the occupant or occupants using a double-bladed paddle in a sitting position, from a hole in the surface deck
To use a kayak, to travel or race in a kayak.
To traverse (a body of water) by kayak.
definitions.example: On a dare, he kayaked the Harlem River in New York from Hell's Gate to Spyten Duyvil.
